responses.title: Medical Check-Up & Student’s Pass Formalities
responses.description: Arrive at least two weeks before classes begin to complete your Student’s Pass formalities and avoid delays. If you've already completed a medical check-up in your home country, you're not required to undergo another in Singapore.
responses.important_note: Send your overseas medical report to stpformalities-singapore@jcu.edu.au before arrival.
responses.details: Students are highly encouraged to arrive in Singapore at least two weeks before the start of classes to ensure the completion of student’s pass formalities. If you have already completed your medical check-up in your home country, you are not required to undergo another medical check-up in Singapore.
responses.time: 09:00 AM to 03:00 PM (Last registration at 02:00 PM)

responses.title: Welcome Speech and JCU 101
responses.description: Kick off your academic journey with key university insights.
speakers: Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching and Student Engagement

responses.title: DigiLearn Workshop & Academic Advising
responses.equipment_required: Laptop or personal computer (no phones or tablets)

responses.title: Academic Advising Breakout Rooms
advising_sessions: Diploma and Bachelor of Business Programs
Postgraduate Business and PQP – Business Programs
Diploma and Bachelor of Arts and Psychological Science Programs
Master of Psychological Science and Postgraduate Psychology Programs
Diploma, Bachelor, and Master of IT and Science Programs

responses.title: Explore Booths
responses.description: Chat with JCU departments and partners about academic support, accommodation, telecommunications, and career development.

responses.title: Network with Lecturers and Peers
responses.description: Build connections with faculty and peers to enhance your JCU experience.
responses.note: Parent’s Lounge will be open; limited parking available on campus.

responses.title: Student’s Pass Completion of Formalities
responses.description: You must arrive in Singapore two weeks before class starts to secure your Student’s Pass. Late arrivals may face delays based on ICA availability.
responses.note: Appointment details will be sent to your email.

notes: Fill the indemnity form on the day of the event.
New Student T-shirts will be given before activity.
